code: const Mutation={createUser:async(_,_ref)=>{let{username,email,role}=_ref;return await User.create({username,email,role});},deleteUser:async(_,_ref2)=>{let{id}=_ref2;try{await User.destroy({where:{id}});return true;}catch(error){console.error('Error deleting user:',error);return false;}},createHotel:async(_,_ref3)=>{let{name,address,description}=_ref3;return await Hotel.create({name,address,description});},deleteHotel:async(_,_ref4)=>{let{id}=_ref4;try{await Hotel.destroy({where:{id}});return true;}catch(error){console.error('Error deleting hotel:',error);return false;}},createRoom:async(_,_ref5)=>{let{hotelId,roomTypeId,number,description}=_ref5;return await Room.create({hotelId,roomTypeId,number,description});},createRoomType:async(_,_ref6)=>{let{name,description,price}=_ref6;return await RoomType.create({name,description,price});},createBooking:async(_,_ref7)=>{let{userId,roomId,checkInDate,checkOutDate,status}=_ref7;return await Booking.create({userId,roomId,checkInDate,checkOutDate,status});}};module.exports=Mutation;
